metadata.title: Bee3
metadata.description: Bee3 is a platform made for selling and buying online completely for free!

not-found.title: Oops... We couldn't find anything matching this search
not-found.paragraph: Try searching for general terms, change the options, or check for typos

messages.min-password-characters: Password should at least contain 8 characters
messages.number: Password should contain at least 1 number
messages.capital-and-lowercase: Password should contain 1 capital and 1 small letter at least
messages.special-char: Password should at least contain 1 special character

email.tos-and-privacy: By signing up, you agree to our <tos>Terms of Service</tos> and <privacyPolicy>Privacy Policy</privacyPolicy>.

user-created-successfully.title: User has been created successfully!
user-created-successfully.description: Check your email to verify your account!

/forgot-password.title: Forgot Password
/forgot-password.description: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link.

toast.success: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox.
toast.error: Failed sending reset email. Please try again.

/reset-password.title: Reset Password
/reset-password.description: Enter your new password to reset your password.
/reset-password.success: Password reset successful. You can now log in with your new password.
/reset-password.token-missing: Token is missing, Please try checking email again.
/reset-password.error: Failed to reset the password. Please try again.

InputNumber.title: Enter your phone number to verify your account

OTP.title: Enter your OTP code you recieved in your WhatsApp account.

not-found.title: Oops, Page not found!
not-found.paragraph: The page you're looking for doesn't seem to exist.

no-favorites.hint: Click the heart icon to add ads to your favorites

not-found.title: Oops, User not found!
not-found.paragraph: The page you're looking for doesn't seem to exist.

name.title: Name
name.description: Your name is shown to the public

bio.title: Bio
bio.placeholder: My name is... and I sell ... I'm experienced in ...

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.paragraph: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

dialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
dialog.paragraph: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

toast.please-wait: Please wait a minute between each user update!

ad-title.label: Title
ad-title.placeholder: Enter the title of your ad
ad-title.description: A short, descriptive title for your item

description.label: Description
description.description: Provide a detailed description of your item

price.label: Price
price.description: Set the price for your item

loading.title: Ad is being processed by our servers
loading.description: This is how it's going to look like

tips.public-place: Only meet in public / crowded places for example metro stations and malls.
tips.bring-companion: Never go alone to meet a buyer / seller, always take someone with you.
tips.inspect-product: Check and inspect the product properly before purchasing it.
tips.no-advance-payment: Never pay anything in advance or transfer money before inspecting the product.

not-found.title: Oops, Ad not found!
not-found.paragraph: The ad you're looking for doesn't seem to exist.

/legal.title: Legal Documents
/legal.footer: Please review our legal documents carefully. For any questions, contact our legal team.

account_not_linked.title: This account is already signed up.
account_not_linked.description: Please try (Google, Facebook) or sign in with email

register.name-min-character: Name should at least contain 2 characters
register.accept-tos-required: You must accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

USER_ALREADY_EXISTS.title: This email already exists
USER_ALREADY_EXISTS.description: Try another one or change password

title.min: Title must be at least 1 character long
title.max: Title must be at most 250 character long

/sell.images: Ad should at least contain 1 image of the item
/sell.description: Description must be at most 2048 characters long
/sell.price: Price must be a positive number
/sell.max-images: You can only upload 10 images per ad
/sell.submit-error: Error submitting the ad. Please try again.
/sell.image-size: Image size must be smaller than 2MB.

failed-not-enough-tokens.title: You don't have enough tokens.
failed-not-enough-tokens.description: Please buy more tokens to continue selling.

must-have-phone-number.title: You must have a phone number

name.invalid: Name must be at least 2 and at most of 20 characters.

bio.invalid: Bio must be at most 75 characters.

input-phone-number.must-be-logged-in: You must be logged in to verify your phone number
input-phone-number.failed-too-many-requests: You're sending your phone number too many times, Please try again in a minute.
input-phone-number.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
input-phone-number.invalid-number: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number
input-phone-number.PHONE_NUMBER_EXISTS: This phone number already exists, please try another one!

OTP.must-be-logged-in: You must be logged in to verify your phone number
OTP.INVALID_OTP: Your OTP is invalid, please try again!
OTP.OTP_EXPIRED: OTP has expired, please try again!
OTP.OTP_NOT_FOUND: OTP not found, please try agian!
